text:
Hi All,
We are a startup which needs a Customer Success Platform. I know you would have come across plenty of them over the years. We are a B2B SAAS product focussed on sales outreach. We use HubSpot as CRM, Marketting , Service…etc solutions. Please feel to redirect my query to any other channel. Thanks in advance for your inputs. :slightly_smiling_face:
Yes! We saw this... It could well be because Google released their March Core Update - it's had a lot of impact for many people

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
Hey Robin - sending you a DM.
Hi, I’m new. - where is the right place to ask questions about menus? (specifically, if I create a menu structure in my dev account, can I easily import that to prod somehow?)
Hi Alberto, I am not the right person on this one. <@U7SL518D6>?

Hey Alberto that should still be working. If the file is inside a theme you may need to open the theme before it highlights the exact file. (Just due to themes displaying a little different in the design tools than normal folders)

Sorry for failing to mention the right person for this :see_no_evil:
<@U7SL518D6> actually I've always used that functionality with the theme folder already opened, so that is not the problem. The thing is that now clicking on "reveal on finder" will indeed open the folder where the file is located but the scroll of the file into view won't happen.
At first I thought it was a bug on my side only, like Chrome being mischievous to me :sweat_smile: but other colleagues of mine reported the same issue.
